column1: RAW STEEL: WORLD PRODUCTION BY COUNTRY OR LOCALITY1, 2
1Table includes data available through May 24, 2022. All data are reported unless otherwise noted
column2: totals may include estimated data. Totals, U.S. data, and estimated data are rounded to no more than three significant digits
column3: may not add to totals shown.

column1: 2Steel formed in solid state after melting, suitable for further processing or sale
column2: for some countries and (or) localities, includes material reported as "liquid steel" presumably measured in the molten state prior to cooling in any specific form.

column1: 3In addition to the countries and (or) localities listed, Hong Kong, and Mozambique, may have produced steel, but available information was inadequate to make reliable estimates of output.
4Figures reported by the State Statistical Bureau that the Government of China considers as official statistical data.
